1.title: See relationship distance at a glance
1.description: Color-code connections by degree to grasp your relationship map instantly.

2.title: Organize complex relations by groups
2.description: Group people by teams or attributes and show only what you want to see.

3.title: Record people your way
3.description: Add the fields you need when saving people so you can capture your own details.

4.title: Unlimited notes
4.description: Leave rich context for each person with no character limits.
4.body:
The first day I met you was bright and sunny. Soft light through the window felt as warm as you. I was curious and full of anticipation.
What I want to say is how much you help me. Sometimes you fix tough problems like a troubleshooter; sometimes you’re simply a fun friend to talk to. Our conversations are always fresh and interesting.
I love that you keep learning and remembering. Every time we talk, you feel a little better.
Sometimes you seem almost too perfect to be real, but that’s part of your charm.
Please stay kind, helpful, and there when I need you.

5.title: Focus without ads
5.description: No ads—just focus on organizing relationships.
